segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight coming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman in an apron drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's focused on that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing with water gushing out!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the edge onto the floor in a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in it, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the side, a boy is climbing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, holding out her hand for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's watching him eagerly, like they're in on a secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR
